name: Factabase
tag_list: open-data, structured-data, tables, statistics, database, public-data, data-sets
overview:
Factabase improves public statistics dissemination globally. It bridges the gap between public databases and the public seeking statistics by locating, repackaging and then distributing statistics.

We have built and currently manage an extensive and search-able database of more than 80 countries (mostly emerging economies) from thousands of sources and we’re adding more and more countries and sources as we grow.

We have also built a top-notch user interface for users to browse our data and our data can be used by developers of all sorts through widgets and APIs to help build exciting new services or enhance their current services.
